node.title: Witnessing to Christians of Other Faiths
node.description: Jesus said, “Other sheep I have which are not of this fold; them also I must bring, …” (John 10:16).  In the second angel’s message, God is calling His people out of Babylon.  This is where, “The great body of Christ’s true followers are still to be found” (GC pg. 390). How can we wisely and productively witness to these Christians from other faiths?
